subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: The lucky-loser entry Lesia Tsurenko beat fifth-seeded Karolina Pliskova, 6-2, 6-2, on Thursday in the Connecticut Open quarterfinals in New Haven.
snippet: The lucky-loser entry Lesia Tsurenko beat fifth-seeded Karolina Pliskova, 6-2, 6-2, on Thursday in the Connecticut Open quarterfinals in New Haven.
